events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund because it does not match what I paid for.
The issue has been classified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
Assigning this refund request to agent Lisa M. who handles such cases.
Hello, this is Lisa from customer support. I understand you did not receive the right item and I am here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is #123456789 and I have attached photos showing that the item is completely different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. I have processed a full refund to your original payment method. You should see the amount back within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for processing the refund promptly. I appreciate the quick response and solution.
The refund case is now resolved, and the customer has been notified of the completion.
Following up to confirm that the refund has been received and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The support case has been closed after confirming the customer's satisfaction with the refund resolution.
